scenario_text.value:
None of us are going home without her! We
won’t leave any of our friends behind!
Let’s go, Lopmon! We’re going to save Miyuki!

Let’s go, Turuiemon! We’re going to save
Miyuki!

Let’s go, Wendimon! We’re going to save
Miyuki!

Let’s go, Andiramon! We’re going to save
Miyuki!

Let’s go, Cherubimon! We’re going to save
Miyuki!
